direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding options to the collection, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods handle the addition of option-related entities (individual options and groups of options) with similar logic.
Both methods add options with specific requirements, though addRequiredOption explicitly sets the option as required.
addOptions relies on getOptions to retrieve the options to be added, indicating a strong dependency.
Both methods handle the presence of options and throw exceptions if duplicates are found, sharing similar exception handling logic.
Both methods manipulate the internal state of the Options object by adding options, though with different parameter configurations.
